description: Comprehensive test suite covering all three MCP servers: docs-mcp, coderef-mcp, and personas-mcp. Includes unit tests, integration tests, and performance tests for complete coverage.
goal: Establish complete test coverage across the MCP ecosystem to ensure reliability, catch regressions, and enable confident refactoring. All three servers should have organized test packages.
requirements: Unit tests for all generators in docs-mcp
Unit tests for context expert system
Integration tests for full MCP tool workflows
Performance tests for large project scanning
Tests for coderef-mcp query and analysis tools
Organized test package structure per server
constraints: Tests must run in CI environment
Use pytest for Python, jest/vitest for TypeScript
